
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdlib.h>


long long int a[10000+1];

long long special_numbers(int d);



int main() {

int T;

scanf("%d", &T);

while (T--) {

int D;

scanf("%d", &D);

printf("%lld\n", special_numbers(D));

}



return 0;

}



long long special_numbers(int d) {

long long int count;

int i;

a[0]=0;a[1]=9;a[2]=90;a[3]=900;a[4]=8991;

if(d<=3)

return (9*pow(10,d-1));



if(d>=4)

{



for(i=5;i<=d;i++)

{

if(a[i]!=0)

continue;

else

{

count=((a[i-1]-a[i-4]*9)*10+a[i-4]*9*9)%1000000007;

if(count<0)

count=1000000007+count;

a[i]=count;

}

}

return a[d];

}



}
